definition: to express thanks

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
surname Xie

sentences.english: Lei Feng never waited for thanks.
sentences.chinese: 雷锋从来不要别人向他道谢。

sentences.english: And also he close the interview also by very warm handshake and also a  genuine thank-you.
sentences.chinese: 面试结束，他也会和面试官握手，并且诚挚地道谢。

sentences.english: He didn't so much as say thank you.
sentences.chinese: 他甚至连句道谢的话也没有说。

sentences.english: Vince still stops by her office every day to thank her.
sentences.chinese: 文斯到现在都还每天经过她的办公室，跟她道谢呢。

sentences.english: When he left he cut short the father's nervous thanks gruffly.
sentences.chinese: 临走时，他很粗鲁地打断了那父亲的紧张的道谢的话。

sentences.english: Elizabeth took an opportunity of thanking her.
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白利用了一个机会向她道谢。

sentences.english: She thanks him and leaves, leaving the post-it note behind.
sentences.chinese: 克里斯蒂娜道谢后离开了，落下了那张便笺纸。

sentences.english: He babbled his thanks in a great hurry.
Please be sure to drop by the plugin author's page and say "Thanks."
sentences.chinese: 因此，请确定访问插件作者的页面并且留下“道谢。”

sentences.english: Ep512 - WaWa visits he lounge bar and says thank you to Jinsheng.
sentences.chinese: 娃娃亲到酒廊拜访金生道谢，金生感动。

sentences.english: Miss Chou heung, I didn't have a chance to thank you.
sentences.chinese: 秋香姐，幸会幸会，上次的事情我还没向你道谢呢。

sentences.english: Thanks to the lins GaoHong to and Lin, hands-on wedding things negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 高虹向林家道谢，亲身来和林家磋商婚礼的事情。

sentences.english: The hermit thanked him, handed the emperor the spade, and then sat down on the ground to rest.
sentences.chinese: 智者道谢并给他铁锹，然后坐在旁边休息了。

sentences.english: However, Mr. Li still didn't come by Bobby's office to thank him in person.
sentences.chinese: 然而，李先生仍没有到巴比的办公室向他当面道谢。

sentences.english: They look around, but Liu Mei did not wait for their thanks.
sentences.chinese: 他们四处看看，但刘梅没有等他们的道谢。
布罗迪打电话向她道谢。

definition: expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to express thanks
to return a greeting/to send a gift in return
to return a politeness/to present a gift in return
gratitude/thanks
to salute/to make one's salutations
to bow with hands held in front
to salute/to greet
to bow/(literary) to bend down
repeatedly (say something)
to say goodbye/to take one's leave
many thanks/thanks a lot
leave-taking/to say goodbye
to say hello to/to send one's regards to
to shed tears of gratitude (idiom); moved to tears
to offer an apology/to make amends
